TEXT.TITLE: AMEX STOCK PRICES CLOSE LOWER
TEXT.BODY: Prices on the American Stock Exchange closed lower in active trading. The AMEX Index fell 0.59 to 341.64. The Average price per share was three cts lower Declines led advances 326 to 282 AMEX volume rose to 14,224,710 shares from 12,855,230 yesterday. Options volume was 345,250 compared to 324,863 yesterday. Reuter
